description: CASA Clean task. For imaging and deconvolution

parameters.info: Name of input visibility file
parameters.name: msname

parameters.info: Pre-name of output images
parameters.name: prefix

parameters.info: Text file with image names, sizes,centers for outliers
parameters.name: outlierfile

parameters.info: Field Name or id
parameters.name: field

parameters.info: Spectral windows e.g. '0~3', '' is all
parameters.name: spw

parameters.info: Other data selection parameters
parameters.name: selectdata

parameters.info: Range of time to select from data, e.g. timerange = 'YYYY/MM/DD/hh:mm:ss~YYYY/MM/DD/hh:mm:ss'
parameters.name: timerange

parameters.info: Select data within uvrange
parameters.name: uvrange

parameters.info: Select data based on antenna/baseline
parameters.name: antenna

parameters.info: Scan number range
parameters.name: scan

parameters.info: Observation ID range
parameters.name: observation

parameters.info: Scan Intent(s)
parameters.name: intent

parameters.info: Spectral gridding type (mfs, channel,velocity, frequency)
parameters.name: mode

parameters.info: Number of channels (planes) in output image; -1 = all
parameters.name: nchan

parameters.info: Begin the output cube at the frequency of this channel in the MS
parameters.name: start

parameters.info: Width of output channel relative to MS channel (# to average)
parameters.name: width

parameters.info: Spectral interpolation (nearest, linear, cubic).
parameters.name: interpolation

parameters.info: Re-restore the cube image to a common beam when True
parameters.name: resmooth

parameters.info: Clean each channel to completion (True), or all channels each cycle (False)
parameters.name: chaniter

parameters.info: velocity frame of output image
parameters.name: outframe

parameters.info: Velocity definition of output image
parameters.name: veltype

parameters.info: Number of Taylor coefficients to model the sky frequency dependence
parameters.name: nterms

parameters.info: Reference frequency (nterms > 1),'' uses central data-frequency
parameters.name: reffreq

parameters.info: Gridding kernel for FFT-based transforms
parameters.name: gridmode

parameters.info: Number of w-projection planes for convolution
parameters.name: wprojplanes

parameters.info: Number of facets along each axis (main image only)
parameters.name: facets

parameters.info: Convolution function cache directory
parameters.name: cfcache

parameters.info: Parallactic angle increment (degrees) for OTF A-term rotation
parameters.name: rotpainc

parameters.info: Parallactic angle increment (degrees) for computing A-term
parameters.name: painc

parameters.info: Maximum number of iterations
parameters.name: clean_iterations

parameters.info: Loop gain for cleaning
parameters.name: gain

parameters.info: Flux level to stop cleaning, must include units: '1.0mJy'
parameters.name: threshold

parameters.info: Method of PSF calculation to use during minor cycles
parameters.name: psfmode

parameters.info: Options: 'csclean' or 'mosaic', '', uses psfmode
parameters.name: imagermode

parameters.info: Individually weight the fields of the mosaic
parameters.name: mosweight

parameters.info: Gridding method for the image
parameters.name: ftmachine

parameters.info: Controls scaling of pixels in the image plane. default='SAULT'; example: scaletype='PBCOR' Options:'PBCOR','SAULT'
parameters.name: scaletype

parameters.info: Controls whether searching for clean components is done in a constant noise residual image (True) or in an optimal signal-to-noise residual image (False)
parameters.name: flatnoise

parameters.info: Controls how often major cycles are done. (e.g. 5 for frequently)
parameters.name: cyclefactor

parameters.info: Cycle threshold doubles in this number of iterations
parameters.name: cyclespeedup

parameters.info: Deconvolution scales (pixels); [] = standard clean
parameters.name: multiscale

parameters.info: Stop cleaning if the largest scale finds this number of neg components
parameters.name: negcomponent

parameters.info: a bias to give more weight toward smaller scales
parameters.name: smallscalebias

parameters.info: Use interactive clean (with GUI viewer)
parameters.name: interactive

parameters.info: Clean iterations before interactive prompt (can be changed)
parameters.name: npercycle

parameters.info: Cleanbox(es), mask image(s),region(s), or a level
parameters.name: mask

parameters.info: x and y image size in pixels.  Single value: same for both
parameters.name: npix

parameters.info: x and y cell size(s). Default unit arcsec.
parameters.name: cellsize

parameters.info: Image center: direction or field index
parameters.name: phasecenter

parameters.info: Rest frequency to assign to image (see help)
parameters.name: restfreq

parameters.info: Stokes params to image (eg I,IV,IQ,IQUV)
parameters.name: stokes

parameters.info: Weighting of uv (natural, uniform,briggs, ...)
parameters.name: weight

parameters.info: Briggs robustness parameter
parameters.name: robust

parameters.info: number of pixels to determine uv-cell size 0=> field of view
parameters.name: npixels

parameters.info: Apply additional uv tapering of visibilities
parameters.name: uvtaper

parameters.info: uv-taper on outer baselines in uv-plane
parameters.name: outertaper

parameters.info: uv-taper in center of uv-plane (not implemented)
parameters.name: innertaper

parameters.info: Name of model image(s) to initialize cleaning
parameters.name: modelimage

parameters.info: Output Gaussian restoring beam for CLEAN image
parameters.name: restoringbeam

parameters.info: Output primary beam-corrected image
parameters.name: pbcor

parameters.info: Minimum PB level to use
parameters.name: minpb

parameters.info: True if to save model visibilities in MODEL_DATA column
parameters.name: usescratch

parameters.info: Divide large image cubes into channel chunks for deconvolution
parameters.name: allowchunk

parameters.info: Convert output images to FITS files
parameters.name: port2fits

parameters.info: Keep casa images when 'port2fits' is enabled
parameters.name: keep_casa_images
